import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Footer from "./components/Footer"; import 'react-responsive-carousel/lib/styles/carousel.min.css'; import image1 from './images/pexels-emrecan-2079249.jpg'; import image2 from './images/pexels-saviesa-home-1098995-2089698.jpg'; import image3 from './images/pexels-christa-grover-977018-2121120.jpg'; // Import the image import image4 from './images/pexels-jessica-bryant-592135-1370704.jpg' import HouseSidingRoundedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/HouseSidingRounded'; import './App.css' function Details() { const houseDetails = [ { id: 1, image: 'image1', title: 'Beautiful House in Suburb', location: 'Suburb, City', price: '$1500/month', bedrooms: '3 Bedrooms', bathrooms: '2 Bathrooms', }, { id: 2, image: 'image2', title: 'Luxury Apartment Downtown', location: 'Downtown, City', price: '$2500/month', bedrooms: '2 Bedrooms', bathrooms: '2 Bathrooms', }, { id: 3, image: 'image3', title: 'Cozy Cottage by the Lake', location: 'Lakefront, City', price: '$1800/month', bedrooms: '2 Bedrooms', bathrooms: '1 Bathroom', }, ]; return (
{/* Left side: Logo */}
{/* Middle: Navigation Links */}
Home Services Pricing Contact
{/* Right side: Sign Up */}
{houseDetails.map((house) => (

{house.title}

{house.location}

{house.price}

{house.bedrooms} | {house.bathrooms}

))}
); } export default Details;
